column1: Please do not remove rows/fields from this form. Simply change the dropdown menus in columnss D, E, F, and G.
If a change is made, the field should automatically BOLD itself the value that was changed so our team can know what you have changed. If it does not do so automatically, please bold the cell.
If you would like to relabel the field, please provide the changed value in column H
If you need clarification on what a field is or have a comment for that field, please enter that comment in column J
If new fields/dropdowns are needed, please add those to the "Create New Fields" tab and any dropdown values to a new column in the Dropdown Values tab
To view the values in the dropdown values, click the arrow in the "see values" cells to see the fields. Please follow instructions on "Dropdown Values" sheet to add/remove values.
If you would like a dropdown value to default to a specific value in the dropdown selections, select it on this page.

column9: Zip Code entry - selection triggers automatic pull of City, State, and County fields
Field to "group" properties together as a portfolio, ie. "Restaurant Franchise Name Locations" - Does not apply to our "bulk bid" feature
Description of the Portfolio (Row 22) if applicable
Potentially used for Job Manager routing - will discuss during JM routing configuration
Simply display's the Bank/Credit Union/Ag Lender/AMC name
Multi-entry text field to input 1 or more parcel numbers for a property

column1: Is there a 1-4 family residential dwelling on the property?
column9: Reg B Trigger - If this and sister Reg B Trigger Question (Row 52) are both set as "yes" during request creation, Reg B emails can be triggered automatically

column1: Is this a first mortgage on property?
column9: Reg B Trigger - If this and sister Reg B Trigger Question (Row 51) are both set as "yes" during request creation, Reg B emails can be triggered automatically
Field to input information about other buildings located on the same property, ie. Barn, Stable, Large Detached Garage/Structure
File upload field allowing user to upload a photo of the property
